faults.title: Early extension (hips toward ball)
faults.fix: Keep trail hip back; chest stays down through impact.

faults.title: Arms outrun pivot
faults.fix: Rotate through; keep hands passive through P6-P8.

drills.name: Wall-Butt Drill
steps: Stand 6 inches from a wall behind you.
Downswing: keep trail hip back longer.

drills.name: Towel Under Arms
steps: Make half swings keeping towel in place.
Rotate chest through; don't throw arms.
